clauses: Preceded, accompanied or followed by acts of violence
Preceded, accompanied or followed by acts of violence causing mutilation or permanent disability
Preceded, accompanied or followed by torture or acts of cruelty
Wilful killing of another person with or without a weapon with no aggravating circumstances
Murder committed with premeditation or by ambush
against a person who is particularly vulnerable by reason of his or her age
against a pregnant woman whose pregnancy is obvious or known to the perpetrator
against a person who is particularly vulnerable by reason of his or her illness or disability which is obvious or known to the perpetrator
against a public official in the performance of his or her duties or in connection therewith
against a victim or a civil party, either to prevent him or her from reporting an offence or seeking reparation for harm
against a witness to prevent him or her from testifying at an investigation, a judicial investigation, a trial or in the proceedings of other complaints
against a victim or a civil party for reporting an offence or seeking reparation for harm suffered
against a witness for testifying at an investigation, a judicial investigation, a trial or in the proceedings of other complaints
committed by a public official in the performance of his or her duties or in connection therewith
Murder preceded or followed by torture, cruelty or rape
